Sentencas: Utilization of propane in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is desired for commercial applications.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: However, the susceptibility of conventional Ni-based anode to coking is still a technical challenge.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Developing an efficient catalyst for hydrogen production through partial oxidation of propane is a feasible approach to address this issue.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: In fact, hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation is profoundly determined by catalyst performance, which further affects the fuel cell efficiency.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: In this study, a robust and efficient catalyst is developed by incorporating inexpensive TiO2 into Ni-Co/Al2O3 catalyst.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: The results suggested that an appropriate amount of TiO2 in catalyst support could regulate the interaction between active metal and Al2O3 support therefore inhibiting catalyst carbon deposition and sintering.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Also, TiO2 addition is conducive to the catalyst regeneration process by reducing the activation energy of oxidative decarburization.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Hydrogen yield was efficiently promoted by the synthesized catalyst.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Consequently, under the equivalent hydrogen (160 ml/min) produced over the catalyst, the SOFCs, with a cathode area of 15 cm(2), display impressive performance (maximum power density, 404 mW/cm(2)) and excellent stability.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Through cost-benefit analysis, the application of the synthesized catalyst is considered for great advantages in capital and energy saving.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications

Sentencas: Ultimately, this work might offer a novel point of view for developing a low-cost, robust and efficient catalyst towards indirect hydrogen production for SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhancement effect of catalyst support on indirect hydrogen production from propane partial oxidation towards commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications
